general_advisory: Due to humidity and cloudy weather conditions, there is a fair chance of occurring various diseases. Monitor the field regularly and take measures.

advisory: The rest amount of fertilizer (nitrogen and phosphorus) that was not applied during basal should be applied in split dose now.
To control the infection, drain the excess of water from the soil and drench the soil with copper oxychloride @2.5 grams/1000 liters of water.
The caterpillar eats the pod and rots it.
To control this, apply Flubendiamide 20%WG @150 grams/ha along with 500 liters of water.
To manage stem weevil in banana crop, install pheromone traps @10/acre.
Dip the banana stem in warm water for 30 minutes before planting.
Sanitize the field and remove the infected plants.
Leaves may curl, wrinkle, and become deformed, with thickened veins and yellow margins
To control the LCV, apply Fipronil@5 grams/plant.
Cattle should be dewormed at regular time intervals and vaccinated properly.
Keep the shed clean and dry to prevent any type of infection.
